text: Frank Richard Fleming (December 11, 1953 â€“ March 6, 2022) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Montana House of Representatives from the 51st district from 2018 until his death in 2022. Fleming was born in Great Falls, Montana. Fleming died on March 6, 2022 from a long-illness in Billings, Montana at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montana Category:People from Great Falls, Montana Category:People from Billings, Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in Montana
title: Frank Fleming (politician)
